mapper.update: update users set user_name = '${user_name}',sex = '${sex}',phone = '${phone}',email = '${email}',state = '${state}', administratir = '${administratir}',password = '${password}' where user_id = '${user_id}'
mapper.select: select * from users where user_name = '${user_name}' and user_id = '${user_id}' and sex = '${sex}'
